author: pawandhananjay
content:
We have a working bpo compliant PR here https://github.com/sigp/lighthouse/pull/7521

author: hangleang.eth
content: with bpo, we're no longer have max blobs fulu, curious how other clients calculate max blobs post-fulu and pre-bpo? are you using max blobs electra or min of all bpo max blobs?

author: hangleang.eth
content: reference to fusaka-devnet-0 blob schedule https://discord.com/channels/595666850260713488/892088344438255616/1376525150069067848

author: pawandhananjay
content: we are using max blobs electra. But i think we should have a `max_blobs_per_block_fulu` and then start the blob schedule.

author: hangleang.eth
content: ohh! then we might on a different fork once fulu activated

author: hangleang.eth
content: maybe not, since min of all bpo max blobs is 9 same as electra

author: hangleang.eth
content: i agree, we should have `max_blobs_per_block_fulu` to handle the case

author: parithosh
content:
Peerdas-devnet-7 sync test results (all supernodes, checkpoint sync was used):
- Teku-nethermind: Synced
- Nimbus-nethermind: Synced
- Teku-reth: Synced
- Prysm-reth: Synced
- Lighthouse-reth: Synced (downloading historic blocks)
- Nimbus-geth: Synced
- Prysm-geth: Synced

- Grandine-nethermind: Syncing
- Prysm-nethermind: Syncing (and for some reason the "current difference" number keeps oscillating)
- Lodestar-nethermind: Syncing
- Nimbus-reth: Syncing (backfill underway)
- Grandine-reth: Syncing
- Lodestar-reth: Syncing
- Grandine-geth: Syncing
- Lodestar-geth: Syncing

- Lighthouse-nethermind: Not syncing, had peers and synced till a certain height then it couldn't find peers
- Teku-geth: ERROR (error pre-samping block ... not on canonical chain)
- Lighthouse-geth: Synced (BUT ERROR Backfill sync failed to start)

author: parithosh
content: So there's clearly sync related work to be done ðŸ˜„

content: I'll update the stats again tomorrow and maybe build something to make this more visible easily.

author: jtraglia
